parameters.name: DbList
parameters.description:
The objects of the change tracking task. The value is a JSON string. For more information, see [Objects of DTS tasks](~~209545~~).

>  You can call the [DescribeDtsJobDetail](~~208925~~) operation to query the original objects of the task.

parameters.name: DtsInstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the change tracking instance. You can call the [DescribeDtsJobs](~~209702~~) operation to query the instance ID.

parameters.name: DtsJobId
parameters.description: The ID of the change tracking task. You can call the [DescribeDtsJobs](~~209702~~) operation to query the task ID.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the region where the change tracking instance resides. For more information, see [List of supported regions](~~141033~~).

parameters.name: SubscriptionDataTypeDDL
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to retrieve data definition language (DDL) statements. Valid values:

*   **true**: yes
*   **false**: no

parameters.name: SubscriptionDataTypeDML
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to retrieve data manipulation language (DML) statements. Valid values:

*   **true**: yes
*   **false**: no
